results.title: The Australian Bicentennial Golf Classic
results.brief_description: The prestigious and classic Australian golfing event, held at the Royal Melbourne Golf course, is one of Australia’s most important Bicentennial sports event. A sensational field of competitors compete for the highest prize money ever offered in an Australian golfing event. The world’s number one golfer, and one of Australia’s greatest sportsmen, Greg Norman, pairs head to head against “Golfer of the Century” Jack Nicklaus. Includes Roger Davis, Nick Faldo and many more of golf’s champion players.

results.title: The Atlantic community: introducing Turkey
results.creator_credit: Vittorio Gallo, Europa Telefilm and North Atlantic Treaty Organization
results.brief_description: The third largest country in NATO, Turkey holds a geographical position of great strategic importance. In less than 40 years since the social and economic revolution begun by Kemal Ataturk, Turkey has made rapid progress in industry and in the raising of her living standards.

results.title: The Atlantic community: introducing the United States
results.creator_credit: News of the Day and North Atlantic Treaty Organization
results.brief_description: Describes the country and the people of the United States - geographical features, historical development and achievements, economic life, occupations of the people, and social customs. Explains the role of the United States in NATO.

results.title: The Atlantic community: introducing the United Kingdom
results.creator_credit: North Atlantic Treaty Organization and World Mirror
results.brief_description: A survey of the United Kingdom as a major member of NATO, showing her expanding industries, her military strength, her highly mechanised agriculture, and her progressive social legislation; and sitting side by side with these the unchanging beauty of her countryside and her love of the best in her past history and traditions.

results.title: The Atlantic community: introducing the Netherlands
results.creator_credit: Ytzen Brusse, North Atlantic Treaty Organization and Ytzen Brusse Productions
results.brief_description: Life in the Netherlands, showing old towns and new suburbs, the network of canals and rivers, and traditional crafts and modern industries. Today the Netherlands occupy a unique position in the Atlantic Community and NATO as the gateway to North-Eastern Europe.

results.title: The Atlantic community: introducing Norway
results.creator_credit: Bjorn Breigutu, Norsk Dokumentarfilm and North Atlantic Treaty Organization
results.brief_description: Life today in Norway’s arctic country, with its seafaring tradition. Small isolated communities export fish and farm every arable acre even on steep slopes, harvesting during the short summer. Other natural resources include valuable timber and water for hydroelectric power used in many industries. Isolation and a harsh climate tend to make family ties strong. Many men serve in the Home Guard to supplement the strength of the regular troops along this part of NATO’s defence line (of which Norway’s border forms a third).
results.creator_credit_for_label: Bjorn Breigutu, Norsk Dokumentarfilm and North Atlantic Treaty Organization

results.title: The Atlantic community: introducing Luxembourg
results.creator_credit: Ytzen Brusse, North Atlantic Treaty Organization and Ytzen Brusse Productions
results.brief_description: Once a great military power, as its many castles testify, the Grand Duchy of Luxembourg is now a highly developed modern society with flourishing industries and agriculture, liberal employment policies and a high standard of living and public education. Luxembourg’s cooperation in the European coal and steel communities and the Benlux group is described in some detail. In 1948 her long period of neutrality was ended by joining NATO, and she is contributing a highly trained combat force, a large airport and an extended road system to the common effort.
